Evaluate Forecasts

Source: R/evaluate.R
evaluate-forecasts.Rd

Evaluate forecasts in the directory, based on id or group, or (if cast_ids = NULL and cast_groups = NULL, the default) evaluate_casts will evaluate all and (if cast_id = NULL and cast_group = NULL, the default), evaluate_cast will evaluate the most recent cast.

evaluate_casts(
  main = ".",
  settings = directory_settings(),
  cast_ids = NULL,
  quiet = FALSE,
  verbose = FALSE
)

evaluate_cast(
  main = ".",
  settings = directory_settings(),
  cast_id = NULL,
  quiet = FALSE,
  verbose = FALSE
)

Arguments

main

character value of the name of the main component of the directory tree.

settings

list of controls for the directory, with defaults set in directory_settings that should generally not need to be altered.

quiet

logical indicator if progress messages should be quieted.

verbose

logical indicator of whether or not to print out all of the information (and thus just the tidy messages).

cast_id, cast_ids

integer (or integer numeric) value(s) representing the casts of interest for evaluating, as indexed within the directory in the casts sub folder. See the casts metadata file (casts_metadata.csv) for summary information.
cast_id can only be a single value, whereas cast_ids can be multiple.

Value

A data.frame, or list of data.frames.

Contents

Developed by Juniper L. Simonis, Glenda M. Yenni, Ellen K. Bledsoe, Erica M. Christensen, Henry Senyondo, Hao Ye, Ethan P. White, S.K. Morgan Ernest.
